Html:
Hi,

When I copy a worksheet into the same document, named ranges of the worksheet copied are note duplicated.

How can I duplicate named ranges with new reference ?

ex: TabA!toto => TabB!toto


$sheet = $sheetModele->copy();
$sheet->setTitle('TabB');
$oModele->addSheet($sheet);

Thanks
